title: Ep. 550 - Cities Burn While Democrats Cheer
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, rabid mobs continue to wreak havoc and destruction in Wisconsin and elsewhere across the country, all with the explicit support of the Democrat Party. Nancy Pelosi said yesterday that Republicans are “domestic enemies.” But that label applies much more to Democrats. Also Five Headlines including Jerry Falwell in a throuple, allegedly. Incredibly important story there. And in our Daily Cancellation, I will cancel PhDs.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
